review: Originally paid for the game a few years back, didn't receive anything after the game turned F2P, just allows more people to cheat or smurf due to accessibility. Game still has bugs, requires you to pay for PVE??? No interesting new characters and some of the already added characters just become boring.

[h1] Not worth it !!! [/h1] 

I miss old Blizzard. "New" Overwatch 2, it's the same game but only worse, how is it possible . Blizzard don't learn from mistakes. 0% creativity and 100% monetization. "Inspired" by a much better title from Valve called:

[Angel singing] ([b]TF2[/b]) [Angel singing]

[quote=some dude from Internet] The longer TF2 is on Steam, the stronger it becomes [/quote]
Overwatch 2 is a cash grab for whales to spend money on, do not support this game

LMAO look at all the negative reviews
on a real note i have no opinions about the game, i just thought the amount of negative reviews is pretty funny, goes to show how the community feels in general.

[h1]Guide of how to make world a better place: [/h1]

1. Download overwatch.
2. Leave it open for 5 minutes.
3. Close it.
4. Click "write a review for Overwatch 2"
5. Write a negative review.
6. Uninstal the game.
7. Remove game from your account.

With those 7 simple steps you made world a better place. Congratulations!

[spoiler] You can make it even better by playing Team Fortress 2 or learning about Gigantic[/spoiler]
